scripts.watch:scss: onchange 'css/*.scss' -- npm run scss && npm run dev
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist -o dist/index.html && usemin precios.html -d dist -o dist/precios.html && usemin contacto.html -d dist -o dist/contacto.html && usemin about.html -d dist -o dist/about.html
scripts.htmlmin: htmlminify -o dist/index.html dist/index.html && htmlminify -o dist/precios.html dist/precios.html && htmlminify -o dist/contacto.html dist/contacto.html && htmlminify -o dist/about.html dist/about.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin && npm run htmlmin
